title: "STOR 390: Introduction to Data Science"
output:

    theme: cosmo

This course is an introduction to data science with R. The first half of the semester will cover core data science programming skills in R following closely [R for Data Science](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/). The second half of the semester will cover a number of topics such as exploratory data analysis, web scraping, text processing and effective visualization through a series of modules. The class will provide a foundation so that you can perform basic data analysis and proceed to more advanced topics.
